doc.field:
TODAY IN WASHINGTON FOR TUESDAY APRIL 7 (TIMES EDT/GMT) FED RELEASES FEB CONSUMER CREDIT (NO SET TIME)... IMF/WORLD BANK MEETINGS INCLUDE GROUP OF 24 DEPUTIES... AND TREASURY SECTY BAKER WITH GROUP OF FIVE FINANCE MINISTERS (NO TIMES)... BUNDESBANK PRESIDENT POEHL AT GERMAN AFFAIRS GROUP ON INTL MONETARY ISSUES (1800/2200)... FED CHAIRMAN VOLCKER TESTIFIES ON THIRD WORLD DEBT PROBLEMS, SENATE BANKING CMTE (0930/1330)... SENATE BUDGET CMTE MEETS ON DRAFTING 1988 BUDGET (1000/1400)...
REUTER
